Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Proficient (shows most elements clearly and correctly)
CAN: Draw and label a device that allows people to communicate over a distance using sound (correctly shows cups and string).
Illustrate the two students using the string telephone to communicate (clearly depicts two students on either end).
Depict the string telephone with two cups connected by a string (shows the string taut).
Show an understanding that sound travels through the string by illustrating lines or arrows (includes arrows from mouth to cup).
CANNOT: May inconsistently label the parts of the device with complete accuracy (e.g., forgets to label the string).
Include an explanation of how the device works using simple words or phrases (may use vague language, e.g., 'talk and hear' without mentioning sound traveling).
